properties.name: com.withrus.spring.tester.security.bcrypt.version
properties.description: The bcrypt version to use when encrypting the passwords

properties.name: com.withrus.spring.tester.security.bcrypt.strength
properties.description: The strength (work factor) to use when encrypting the passwords

properties.name: server.locale.default
properties.description: The default locale of the server

properties.name: server.locale.parameter-name
properties.description: The name of the request parameter used to change the locale of the server for a specific request
